thread.section_title: Hotel des Saints-Peres - Esprit de France - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely, historic sanctuary
thread.title_full: Lovely, historic sanctuary - Review of Hotel des Saints-Peres - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: karenpQ5717YM
title: Lovely, historic sanctuary
text: A friend recommended this hotel for my week long stay in Paris. Originally, my stay at this hotel was scheduled for 3 days, but I decided to extended it for 2 more days. I stayed in 2 different rooms and felt that the rooms were nicely decorated and I also enjoyed the different portraits featured in each room. Each member of the staff that I interacted with was very pleasant as well as helpful. I highly recommend this hotel!
